examples.text: Could you tell me more about it
want to check my acct bal
whats the balance on my account
The product description is different from the display
How do I return the product?
i want to return the product
My payment did not go through. What do I do?
Why I am not able to select loan tenure below 6 month?
Why I am not able to select loan amount below 25000?
Which Branch do I have to go for signing the documents?
What if I want loan for higher amount and longer duration?
What happens if there is a spelling mistake in my name printed on Adhaar card?
Is the Interest rate  fixed or floating?
I have not received any letter asking my confirmation
If I Pay some Lumpsum amout ,will my EMI reduce?
Can I select my EMI amount?
Can I get credit of loan amount in Account other than mentioned on the  screen
Can I enter a mobile number other than the one used for downloading the app.
Can FATCA status be updated later?
My mobile camera not working . What to do?
how can i reset my password
can you help with password reset
can you help me with the process to register
can i have a look at my transactions
what are the activities on my account
Do we have a branch in new york?
help me with branches in andheri
which are the branches in US?
where are the branches in mumbai
i want to visit the nearest branch
is there a branch in cochin
could you give me the branch address at Andheri
pay the last statement balance on
add an account for transferring money
